original_title: SJB to take disciplinary action against Fowzie
original_body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) has decided to take disciplinary action against MP A.H.M. Fowzie for voting in favour of the Resolution on the IMF agreement during the parliamentary vote on Friday (April 28).
General Secretary of the main opposition Ranjith Madduma Bandara says Fowzie’s move is in contravention of the party’s decision.
